contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 26, 2020 D Cory Online Brass Band Championships (Championship Section)
Cory Online Brass Band Championships (Championship Section) 0 Entertainments Contest Cory Online Brass Band Championships (Special) cory-online-entertainment-contest-special
(online) Virtual Contest: Idea and hosted by the Cory Band and supported by different Partners, for entertaining Brass Sound during Covid-19 Pandemic. > held on Weekends of September 18th/19th (First - Third Section) & 25th/26th (Championship & Fourth)
Open Format (all Bands / worldwide) consisting Videos with Entertainment Pieces to build a consisting Programme to upload. Sections from Championship - Fourth and various Prizes awarded.
Nigel Seaman provided tie-breaker mark.
Most Entertaining Programme & Best Trombones: Hitchin Band Best Cornets & Best Percussion: Fountain City Brass Band Best Welsh Music Performance, Best Horns & Best Euphoniums/Baritones: City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Best Soloist - Chris Bradley (Cornet) & Best Basses: Whitburn
June 18, 2020, 3:04 p.m. Sept. 29, 2020, 4:45 p.m.
1 Fountain City Brass Joseph Parisi
2 Whitburn Band Bryan Allen
3 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Christopher Bond
4 The GUS Band Chris Jeans
5 Strata Brass Robert Dibden
6 Redbridge Brass Chris Bearman
7 Leyland Band Thomas Wyss
8 Hitchin Band Nicholas Garman
9 Elland Silver Band Danny Brooks
10 Glenferrie Brass Unknown
11 Michelmersh Silver Band Melvin White
12 Langley Band Cliff Parker
13 Enderby Band Ryan Richards
14 Brass Band Leieland Sam Werbrouck
15 Easington Colliery Band Unknown
